voxatrace/com.musicmuni.voxatrace.sonix.util/MidiUtils

MidiUtils

object MidiUtils

Utility functions for MIDI generation and manipulation. Ported from lib_audio Utils.java.

Functions

fun generateMidiFile(notes: List<MidiNote>): MidiFile

hzToMidiNote
Link copied to clipboard
fun hzToMidiNote(pitchHz: Float, parentTonicHz: Float, lessonTonicHz: Float): Int

Convert pitch in Hz to MIDI note number, relative to lesson tonic. Note: Uses C4 (middle C) = 261.63 Hz as reference for MIDI note 60.
